hello miss heartbroke sit your sweet self down

ive had trouble of my own i think i understand

chorus
well put out your old flame well build a bigger fire
ill pick up where he let you down and take you so much higher

verse 2
come on let your hair down well have us a time
he had his chance with you now all i want is mine
give me half an hour or just a dance or two
and youll forget old whatshisname and how he walked out on you
